haxegui

haxegui.managers.ScriptManager

type
class
implements
Dynamic
available in
flash9
ScriptManager handles running scripts for styling controls

Static Variables

public debug : Bool

public debug_events : Array<String>

private defaultActions : Hash<ScriptObject>

private initialized : Bool

private instanceActions : flash.utils.TypedDictionary<haxegui.ComponentHash<ScriptObject>>

Static Methods

public commonSetup(interp : hscript.Interp, obj : flash.display.DisplayObject, opts : Dynamic) : Void

private doCall(inst : haxegui.Component, so : ScriptObject, options : Dynamic) : Dynamic

Inlined method for exec, for readability. Returns result of executed code

public exec(inst : haxegui.Component, action : String, options : Dynamic) : Dynamic

parameters
inst The component executing the script ("this")
action An action type
options Object with key->value mapping of vars to pass to script
Execute a script for a particular Component

private getDefaultActionKey(classType : Class<Dynamic>, action : String) : String

returns
String key used to index the defaultActions Hash
Returns the key for the default action for the given Component instance

private getDefaultActionObject(classType : Class<Dynamic>, action : String) : ScriptObject

parameters
classType
action ScriptManager action var name
returns
ScriptObject which is the default for the Component type
throws
String "No default action." if a default action does not exist
Returns the default ScriptObject for the classType, throwing an error if it does not exist.

public getInstanceActionObject(inst : haxegui.Component, action : String) : ScriptObject

parameters
inst A Component
action Action type
returns
ScriptObject, either the instance one, or the default for the class
throws
String on error
Finds the best script for a Component instance for a given action. If the instance has it's own script, that is returned, otherwise the default for the instance's class type is returned, if any.

public getInstanceOwnActionObject(inst : haxegui.Component, action : String) : ScriptObject

parameters
inst A Component
action Action type
returns
ScriptObject or null if component instance has no action
Finds the ScriptObject for an action on a Component instance.

public initialize() : Void

public redirectTraces(f : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
func A Dynamic->?haxe.PosInfos->Void logging function
Redirect "trace" calls to a new handler.

public setDefaultScript(classType : Class<Dynamic>, action : String, code : String, ?init : hscript.Interp -> Void, ?setup : hscript.Interp -> flash.display.DisplayObject -> Dynamic -> Void) : String

parameters
action An action name
code The code to execute.
init The initialization function for the interpreter, which is run once
setup The function called each time a display object needs to run the script
throws
String if action is invalid
Sets the hscript for a particular event. All events are the same names as the public fields of the ScriptManager instance.

public setInstanceScript(inst : haxegui.Component, action : String, code : String, ?init : hscript.Interp -> Void, ?setup : hscript.Interp -> flash.display.DisplayObject -> Dynamic -> Void) : String

parameters
action An action name
code The code to execute.
init The initialization function for the interpreter, which is run once
setup The function called each time a display object needs to run the script
returns
The code provided, for chaining in setters.
throws
String if action is invalid
Sets the hscript for a particular event. All events are the same names as the public fields of the ScriptManager instance.
